data: `minecraft:behavior.slime_random_direction` allows the entity to move in random directions like a slime.

data.Name: add_random_time_range
data.Description: Additional time (in whole seconds), chosen randomly in the range of [0, "add_random_time_range"], to add to "min_change_direction_time".

data.Name: min_change_direction_time
data.Description: Constant minimum time (in seconds) to wait before choosing a new direction.

data.Name: turn_range
data.Description: Maximum rotation angle range (in degrees) when randomly choosing a new direction.
